description: Creates an order for an Outpost.

parameters.name: OutpostIdentifier
parameters.description: The ID or the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Outpost.

parameters.name: LineItems
parameters.description: The line items that make up the order. (dict) --- Information about a line item request. CatalogItemId (string) --- The ID of the catalog item. Quantity (integer) --- The quantity of a line item request.

nested_params.name: CatalogItemId
nested_params.description: The ID of the catalog item.

nested_params.name: Quantity
nested_params.description: The quantity of a line item request.

nested_items.name: OutpostId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Outpost in the order.

nested_items.name: OrderId
nested_items.description: The ID of the order.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the order.
PREPARING - Order is received and being prepared.
IN_PROGRESS - Order is either being built or shipped. To get more details, see the line item status.
DELIVERED - Order was delivered to the Outpost site.
COMPLETED - Order is complete.
CANCELLED - Order is cancelled.
ERROR - Customer should contact support.

nested_items.name: LineItems
nested_items.description: The line items for the order.

nested_items.name: CatalogItemId
nested_items.description: The ID of the catalog item.

nested_items.name: LineItemId
nested_items.description: The ID of the line item.

nested_items.name: Quantity
nested_items.description: The quantity of the line item.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the line item.

nested_items.name: ShipmentInformation
nested_items.description: Information about a line item shipment.

nested_items.name: ShipmentTrackingNumber
nested_items.description: The tracking number of the shipment.

nested_items.name: ShipmentCarrier
nested_items.description: The carrier of the shipment.

nested_items.name: AssetInformationList
nested_items.description: Information about assets.

nested_items.name: AssetId
nested_items.description: The ID of the asset. An Outpost asset can be a single server within an Outposts rack or an Outposts server configuration.

nested_items.name: MacAddressList
nested_items.description: The MAC addresses of the asset.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: PreviousLineItemId
nested_items.description: The ID of the previous line item.

nested_items.name: PreviousOrderId
nested_items.description: The ID of the previous order.

nested_items.name: PaymentOption
nested_items.description: The payment option for the order.

nested_items.name: OrderSubmissionDate
nested_items.description: The submission date for the order.

nested_items.name: OrderFulfilledDate
nested_items.description: The fulfillment date of the order.

nested_items.name: PaymentTerm
nested_items.description: The payment term.

nested_items.name: OrderType
nested_items.description: The type of order.
